bibl.title: Papyrus Universitatis Atheniensis 2782. - Records of "The Commandments of the Seven Wise Men" in the 3rd c. B.C. The Revered "Greek Reading-book" of the Hellenistic World.
bibl.note: See p. 71: New Text formed from P. Athen. Univ. Inv. 2782 [ed.: A.N. Oikonomides, ZPE 37 (1980) pp. 179-183] and the Inscriptions from Miletopolis in Asia Minor and Ai-Khanum in Afghanistan.
Oikonomides A.N., Papyrus Universitatis Atheniensis 2782. - Records of "The Commandments of the Seven Wise Men" in the 3rd c. B.C. The Revered "Greek Reading-book" of the Hellenistic World.
